title: Need better customer service.
text: A lot of the clothes is size wrong so it’s hard to buy without being able to try on. None of the rainbow stores that I’ve gone to have fitting rooms so you can’t try on clothes but yet they give you a hard time when you’re trying to return closed it did not fit. Cashiers need to inform customers about their return policy and what’s returnable and what’s not so customers can make the decision whether they want to purchase the item or not. Not get a big surprise when they come back to return it if it doesn’t fit and they can’t. I’ve an issue twice already I’m done. Wasting my gas back-and-forth. I’ll be shopping elsewhere.

title: Rainbow has affordable clothing…
text: Rainbow has affordable clothing unfortunately after trying to exchange a pair of jeans with a receipt, I was told without the price tag on the pants they couldn’t be exchange. This is poor customer service. Especially since there isn’t a changing room available to try items on before buying.

title: I like you clothing but It appears that…
text: I like you clothing but It appears that you are always out of stock for the things that I go to your site for. I wear a Large and can never find the size in normal regular solid color shirts or tank tops with the shelf bra. Even hard to find when I go the Rainbow Shops store for them. Please stock more of the popular sizes as this has been happening for years across all seasons. I originally wanted long sleeve shirts but had to settle for short because it was available.

title: Fabric description was incorrect.
text: I received my products but I am not pleased, you have got to do a better job at updating your product description. I was looking for leggings based off the fabric description I had from some I had already bought from you guys in-store, and since I haven't been able to find them whenever I go to your stores I decided to look for them in your website and out of all of your options I choose the ones matching that description, but as it turns out the leggings I received don't look or fit the same and the tag describes a different fabric as well.***Reply to Rainbow review***Luckily I was able to return them for a full refund at a store nearby, with no issues. But to answer your question, the fabric on the tag said they were 95% cotton and 5% spandex. Which I have already tried but they ripped pretty easily unlike the ones I was looking for.

title: Make Sure They're Not Sending U Used Items…
text: I purchased a pair of used cream colored boots with permanent light pink markings on them back in February. Me knowing that Rainbow online will send you used merchandise, I should've been more vigilant but I was in the process of getting a new place and just glanced over a boot and put it back in the box. Everything was fine until March when I actually took them from the box and got into my new place and saw all of the markings on the boots. All over both boots. The heels in different spots. I was so hurt, not surprised though. I called Rainbow to let them know. They responded about their 30 day policy. I sent in an email and got the same response. I reported them to the BBB because they have a problem taking back their used defective items over 30 days old but they don't have a problem sending customers used items or with HEPA violations.

title: Strength and longevity needs attention.
text: The delivery time and updates were awesome. The shoe sizes were accurate and the comfort level for the shoes were as expected. However, on wearing the strappy toe loop sandals for the first time, it burst. I received several compliments on each shoe including the one highlighted, but to be with a damaged new shoe on first wear makes me extremely cautious to wear the others in my order.

title: I wanted to order 6 pairs of boots but…
text: I wanted to order 6 pairs of boots but every address I gave in Los Angeles said the order could not be sent to that address. When I reduce my order to two pairs of boots, the order was complete. Now I have to make separate orders and pay more for shipping

title: My total purchase was way to high

title: Charged wrong card after selecting another card, CSR was no help!!!

I tried to cancel my order and called, and was told that once I hit submit button it is nothing they can do. I just placed the order a few minutes and they can't do anything???!! So disappointed because I am sure they can correct this matter since I called them immediately after the submit button and seeing that it used my VISA card. They must do better!!! The Customer service Rep. Rebecca didn't even ask for my order #. You'll definitely lose business like this, I was going to change the payment method by phone but was told it couldn't be done. Well, I'll return my order and get a refund.

title: Mmeeh 🫤

I then had to pay for shipping to get my refund . They should do free returns and anything additional to that same order should be charged on the return.

title: Customer Service Sucks

They claimed the order was being processed and couldn't be cancelled. The email did say I could bring the items to the store, but that won't work. This is the 3rd time I ordered something from Rainbow, but the second time, I had two items that needed to be returned. I took the items to the store and was supposed to have received a store credit, but when I then went back to purchase something for my daughter, there was no money on the card. They had to uniform items and my man's money! Fool me once, shame on me, but I'd be dang if I'll let you fool me again. Although the mistake was my fault, there is no way in heck they began processing my order four minutes after I placed the order. Amazon doesn't work that fast! Shoppers beware.

title: Online ordering difficulties & return time frame issues good jogger sets available tho
text: Online had to start over with my order multiple times. One scrolling on the site and pressing on the clothes to check the size as I was sent to the top which delayed me purchasing items before they sold out me filling up my car to make selections at the end was hard as site blocked me for adding multiple items in my cart not sure why. X6 items jogging suits are cute wish they were offered in bigger kids sizes. More options for two piece jogging suits. Colors & designs are needed lots of the same colors. Coat zippers easy to break discount should be had if can prove broken. 30 day return & store credit if tags are gone should be offered I don’t shop here over other places or spend as much anymore because returns are difficult & unreliable especially to loyal shoppers. No rewards program. When customers are spending a certain amount returns should be longer & or store credits given for items new no visible damage. Return policy is to strict & complicated (online shipping takes time too cutting into the time frame for return etc) more time is needed for return window ppl have busy lives working more hours to survive & have money to spend more time is needed as well for ppl gifting & or separated parents (example: my kids, father bought some clothes and brought it to her during her birthday but he bought it ahead of schedule by the time she got it and tried it on he did not fit he paid on his card. I tried to return it, but there was no option to use card payment history I believe he did not take a receipt, and or he missed placed it I then could not return the items that is when I stopped shopping with this store. That was a waste of $200-$300 dollars I ended up having to buy her more stuff & stuck with clothes I couldn’t use) I also bought expensive keychain & Jewelry that broke or didn’t work well smh I definitely have had quality issues but the stores are always organized but too full which is great but gets overwhelming at times but options good. Need 1x sizing I’m XL-1x active wear sets for kids & adults would be great. Overall I like the different designs on the jeans. I love when you are used to sell sets for kids that came with a jacket, a belt, jeans, and a shirt. This was a great thing for birthdays and events kinda of a one and done thing. Changing room availability is an issue to use in cities we are subjected to wrong size shopping change in isles is embarrassing because we can’t use the changing rooms this stop ppl from shopping. I appreciate the fact that the prices at a time can be affordable, especially with the economy change. I hope all this information was helpful staff as usually very friendly. Please add more items to online as MOA has more selections than city high traffic areas as I would like to purchase more items, but can’t access it that far out.

title: The return process is TOO DIFFICULT…
text: The return process is TOO DIFFICULT especially for online orders. They should tell people that not all Rainbow stores returns are accepted. I couldn’t return Children’s clothes at one store because they do not sell Children’s clothes. Please advise that in the return policy to let shoppers/costumers know. Then I drove another 10 minutes to return it to a mall that couldn’t do returns because the mall was going under renovation by the following week. The lady seen my distress and seen that I drove two towns over so she went ahead and returned the items. Thank goodness for her. I had 9 other items I had purchased but 3 of the items ran way too small so needed to be returned.At the second store the people were friendly at the mall (Lafayette Square) but the staff was rude in (Speedway) they also need to have signs on the door that say WE DO NOT ACCEPT CHILDREN’S RETURNS!!! Also to return by shipping is $7.95 which deducts from your refund or you can pay at FedEx upon arrival. Which that is another inconvenience because not everyone is close to a FedEx. I guess it was a better option then being compared to the gas I used driving over from Nowheresville to the city then making two additional stops. Rainbow on return policies please do better. The shipping was “incredibly fast” and there is a lot of variety on their website and in stores. If it wasn’t for the horrible return experience and unreasonable staff (Speedway) I would of rated higher. It Seems to me the company wants to keep your money and make all sales final. I question if overall it’s a demographics issue because I clearly seen who mostly shops at these stores. Which that itself seems discriminatory within itself that these companies treat you based on the overall demographics of the shoppers which is morally wrong. They didn’t do this at Target, Abercrombie or Kohls when I returned things the previous day. Worse case scenario I would of disputed the items on my American Express Card. Hint* another reason why the lady went ahead and did the return. AMEX doesn’t play around with companies/stores not honoring store return policies. Seems like Rainbow does this at a discretion. So I can no longer shop at these stores due to the hassle of returning and the un-politeness of the staff.

I was grateful for her valuing me as a customer therefore I thanked her and bought another pair of shoes as well.  I expressed to the cashier ( Latasha Brown) let me have her name and that I appreciated her for offering great customer service also. The quality of the clothing was accurate for the price but the down side is the return policy. The clothing at Rainbow Shops is relatively cheap, but the return charges $6.95 which is a big deduction of what most would pay for. Because of this, the item is not really worth returning. I also headed to the website again and searched what I purchased but nothing showed up. I could not find the piece I ordered, even when searching the exact title of what I purchased. Overall, I got what I paid for, but the shipping was delayed, there isn't much of a benefit in returning the product, and I could not find the same item I purchased again, which is why I gave the rating of two stars.

title: Rainbow should Use UPS instead of FedEx
text: Pkg left Rainbow fast but the FedEx tracking is horrible. My pkg was in PA, IN, then WI, then Chgo, then back to WI for days & the trail goes cold, then it left WI after 5 days and is currently somewhere. I'm in Midwest, it passed right thru my city. It's like it's circling around & around. I have no idea when I'll receive it. I've had better success with stores that use UPS.  UPS is fast and reliable, even when shipping is going to a PO BOX at the main PO in Chgo which happens to be a major shipping hub. Not happy with the Rainbow shipping vendor. FedEx cust service wasn't much help either. So, I won't know if I like my merchandise until late next wk, which puts shipping time at 10+ days or more, depending when I actually get notice that it's in my PO BOX. Was hoping the pkg came this wk to give a gift to a friend who's only here until Saturday. Probably won't order online fr Rainbow again unless they switch to UPS.

title: They don't stand behind their defective clothing
text: Company does not stand behind it's products.  I hand-washed a brand new shirt, NEVER WORN, and it ripped and shrunk.  When I called customer service, they were rude and told me that it's not their fault the shirt ripped and shrunk and they wouldn't take it back.  I had ordered the same shirt in other colors and it did not shrink or rip, so obviously that shirt was defective but they wouldn't let me send it back for a refund or store credit.I also tried to return a body suit, new with tags and they wouldn't accept it because "it goes between the leg."  So do leggings, yet those can be returned.  Staff is somewhat rude.And lastly, I signed up for text messaging and was supposed to get 10% off and the cashier assured me that she gave it to me, but when I got home and looked at the receipt it had not been given.  My purchase was more than $100 and my first time in the store.  When I called the store and corporate, neither one of them helped me.  They said I had to give the code at check out.  When I explained that I did and have the time stamp of the receipt and the text message they sent me with the coupon code, you could see that they should have given me the discount but didn't.  They said they couldn't help me.  Horrible customer service both in the store an through corporate.You might think you're getting a good deal on cheap clothing, however, you can get FAR BETTER quality and prices off the clearance racks of Dillard's, Macy's, Stein Mart, Nordstrom Rack, etc.

title: DISAPPOINTED WITH MY PURCHASE

I have been trying to wear them for my daughter's wedding on 8th December but not making much difference.  Such a shame as they match my dress perfectly.  I got these shoes in April and it says you can't return after they have been dyed so I am stuck with them and they are not particularly cheap.

text: I want to give a one star. However, I absolutely love your clothes. Always fit, always stylish. That is what I went for, so why not a 5 star?   Its the staff and the constant flow of disrespectful customers that warranted a low review. Today I was verbally and racial assaulted in your store #00244 in Holyoke, MA. Than I physically assaulted.   I ignored the woman and finished my transaction. The operator: 8071YF that was assisting me, asked me in Spanish, if I understood Spanish. I replied, in Spanish that I did and presided to walk to the exit. When I turned around the woman that was being belligerent took one step to her left, than proceeded to shoulder bump me. Than sarcastically said, "Oh sorry" as she continued to walk by. I immediately stopped, looked around to see who was around. Their was no one but the store manager and employee behind the counter. Watching with their jaws dropped. Than I turned to the belligerent racist woman. I said, in a calm voice, "You know what you did".  She again was rude.As a woman in my thirties I did not engage and I turned and walked out. She continued to laugh with staff and talk in Spanish about the "Perra blanca".   I got to my car than I ended up walking back. To make a formal complaint. The Manager on duty stated she didn't see anything and she isn't in control of her customers and I was asked to leave. I refused and demanded to speak to someone who is above her. The manger on duty did make a call and I spoke to a woman on the phone. She stated that her DM was out but I believe she said she was regional. I could be mistaken about that detail. Very helpful woman and she did sound concerned. I am happy that someone within the company doesn't condone this activity. Now, is this a big deal? Maybe not. Their are horrible ppl everywhere. However, I always seem to have a higher amount of these encounters when I walk through Rainbows. Which ever store I go to in my region, it does't matter. For that, I have to say goodbye. I mean, am I supposed to go to a "White" Rainbows? I am married to a Hispanic and was raised with immigrants from an island in the Mediterranean. I believe in equality and what civil rights stand for. I would like Rainbows to stand with me and the many of us from all different nations that just want to wear something nice without fear of discrimination! I only wanted to get a pretty dress for my daughters 4th grade graduation. I didn't think I would be entering a war zone to shop. The sad thing is, this is not the first time, this exact same thing happened in the same exact store just a year before.
